Params[3]: Lucia, what did you find today?
...It's not a bad haul. I found this.
Lucia opens the can with her trusty pocket knife and passes the can to Luna.
Be careful of the sharp edges.
I ate already on my way back.
Luna nods, trusting the words of her older sister. Then she sips some of the broth packed with the synthesized meat inside the can.
Lucia, when can I go out with you?
But, you're always the one protecting me... It's my turn to protect you... Or at least, help...
You're being good help for looking after our food stash.
I promised our parents that I would never let anyone hurt you. So, I'll handle the riskier tasks...
